definitions.text: an imperfection in an object or machine
examples: a flaw caused the crystal to shatter
if there are any defects you should send it back to the manufacturer

definitions.text: defect or weakness in a person's character
examples: he had his flaws, but he was great nonetheless

definitions.text: an imperfection in a plan or theory or legal document that causes it to fail or that reduces its effectiveness
add a flaw or blemish to; make imperfect or defective
